mapper.insert: insert into paper (ID, SOURCE_ID, EXAM_TYPE_ID, EDUCATIONAL_STAGE, SUBJECT, `NAME`, `YEAR`, DIFFICULTY, IS_SCHOOL, IS_CONTEST, GRADE_ID, ORDINAL_NUMBER, PAPER_REF, PAPER_REF2, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{examTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{educationalStage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subject,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{difficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSchool,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isContest,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordinalNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paperRef,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperRef2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update paper set SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, EXAM_TYPE_ID = #{examTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EDUCATIONAL_STAGE = #{educationalStage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `YEAR` = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DIFFICULTY = #{difficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_SCHOOL = #{isSchool,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_CONTEST = #{isContest,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GRADE_ID = #{gradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDINAL_NUMBER = #{ordinalNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAPER_REF = #{paperRef,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAPER_REF2 = #{paperRef2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SOURCE_ID, EXAM_TYPE_ID, EDUCATIONAL_STAGE, SUBJECT, `NAME`, `YEAR`, DIFFICULTY, IS_SCHOOL, IS_CONTEST, GRADE_ID, ORDINAL_NUMBER, PAPER_REF, PAPER_REF2, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from paper where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, SOURCE_ID, EXAM_TYPE_ID, EDUCATIONAL_STAGE, SUBJECT, `NAME`, `YEAR`, DIFFICULTY, IS_SCHOOL, IS_CONTEST, GRADE_ID, ORDINAL_NUMBER, PAPER_REF, PAPER_REF2, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from paper
